content: Step through the archway and look to the left to see a treasure chest. Open this to find Blood of the Iron Bull and gold pieces. Proceed up the stairs to the right, past the bull guard, and fire will start to rain down on you -- which you know means another cart is not far off!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crimson-Silver_Cart.md', within the main section titled 'Crimson-Silver Cart'.
The content is as follows:
Step through the archway and look to the left to see a treasure chest. Open this to find Blood of the Iron Bull and gold pieces. Proceed up the stairs to the right, past the bull guard, and fire will start to rain down on you -- which you know means another cart is not far off!
